statements: SELECT user_id, page_views, date FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT date, click_through_rate, page_views FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT time_spent_on_page, user_id FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 5.0;
SELECT user_id, date, page_views, time_spent_on_page FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, page_views FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY time_spent_on_page DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(page_views), SUM(click_through_rate) FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, date, page_views, click_through_rate, time_spent_on_page FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE page_views > 1000 AND time_spent_on_page BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT MAX(time_spent_on_page) AS max_time_spent FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT username, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT target_audience, conversion_rate FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT username, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_audience LIKE '%social%';
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM UserEngagementMetrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserSegments WHERE segment_name='New Users';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM UserSegments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT UEM.user_id, UEM.engagement_score, CA.campaign_name FROM UserEngagementMetrics UEM JOIN CampaignAnalysis CA ON UEM.user_id=CA.engagement_metric_id;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM UserSegments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING total_users > 5 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(engagement_score) AS total_engagement FROM UserEngagementMetrics;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE total_visits > 10 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, last_login, total_visits FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM user_segments WHERE JSON_LENGTH(segment_criteria) > 0;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, total_clicks FROM campaign_metrics WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE total_visits > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_clicks FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_clicks > 100 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM user_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT event_id, event_name, user_id FROM events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start < '2022-05-01';
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM sessions WHERE session_end IS NULL ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT e.event_name, u.username, c.campaign_name FROM events e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id JOIN campaigns c ON e.user_id = c.user_id WHERE e.event_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT u.username, s.session_start, s.session_end, e.event_name FROM users u JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN events e ON s.user_id = e.user_id ORDER BY s.session_start DESC;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(ue.event_id) AS total_engagements FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_engagement ue ON u.user_id = ue.event_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_engagements > 0 ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
